name: YGH Trojan Executable
summary: Learn about .YGH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Trojans are computer programs that appear legitimate but instead install viruses and malware on your system. Some trojans install and execute YGH files, such as troj_dloader.ygh and w2km_fareit.ygh, which contain malicious programs.

description: A YGH file is likely a malicious virus or malware file that was contained within a trojan. If you've encountered a YGH file that you do not trust, you should delete the file. You should also scan your system for viruses and malware.

instructions: You should not open a YGH file or run the program it contains. In most cases, you should delete any YGH files you encounter. After you do, you should use an antivirus program to scan your system for viruses and malware.
